messages.message: quick question about human review frontend, do we not display `__model_result` (aihub native apps) because it is a hidden field (denoted by "__") or do we acc match the app schema to the results endpoint response?
i ask cuz i wanna know if it's easier to mark any helper fields in the case program as hidden or if it'll work as is

i inspected the elements of the field list -> saw `data-testid="FIELD_LIST"` -> this attribute is applied in `FlowFieldEditor/index.ts`

i investigated this manually, then asked Cursor -> Cursor did a pretty good job! but i'll still type out the explanation from my manual investigation :sweat_smile:

i added `FlowFieldEditor/index.ts` to the context and asked `how does FlowFieldEditor decide what fields to list? how are hidden fields filtered out?`

• `FlowFieldEditor` calls useFilteredResults (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/efb9f4f/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/features/Review/components/SingleDocumentView/helpers.tsx#L392) and lists fields according to the `fields.required` returned by `useFilteredResults`
• `fields.required` is returned based on `requiredFields`
    ◦ which is computed from `filteredFields`
    ◦ which is computed from `resultsByErrorsAndHidden`
    ◦ which is computed from `resultsByHidden`
• `resultsByHidden` is computed by useFilteredHiddenFields (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/efb9f4f/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/features/Review/components/SingleDocumentView/helpers.tsx#L96), which uses `isHiddenField` to filter the list
• isHiddenField (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/efb9f4ff1a781c5a42c6fdac12141763be273270/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/lib/src/IBUtils/lib/StrUtils.ts#L27) just returns whether the field name starts with `__` 
so @ayesha.ali yes to your first question! and yes, helper fields that start with `__` should be filtered out with the existing FE code
Sounds good! For now we have no hidden fields in the case program but we can make that change for every field that is not an actual case field
